ShortEnum.name: glance behavior
ShortEnum.description: how does the speaker of this vocalization direct his gaze?

ShortEnum.name: glance recipient behavior
ShortEnum.description: how does someone who hears me behave?

Real.name: sound repetition delay
Real.description: Minimum delay time between playing the same permutation

Real.name: allowable queue delay
Real.description: How long to wait to actually start the vocalization

Real.name: pre voc. delay
Real.description: How long to wait to actually start the vocalization

Real.name: notification delay
Real.description: How long into the vocalization the AI should be notified

Real.name: post voc. delay
Real.description: How long speech is suppressed in the speaking unit after vocalizing

Real.name: repeat delay
Real.description: How long before the same vocalization can be repeated

Real.name: weight
Real.description: Inherent weight of this vocalization

Real.name: speaker freeze time
Real.description: speaker won't move for the given amount of time

Real.name: listener freeze time
Real.description: listener won't move for the given amount of time (from start of vocalization)

Bit.name: cause is player or speaker is player ally

ShortEnum.name: listener/target
ShortEnum.description: who/what am I speaking to/of?

ShortEnum.name: hostility
ShortEnum.description: The relationship between the subject and the cause

ShortEnum.name: danger level
ShortEnum.description: Speaker must have danger level of at least this much

ShortEnum.name: spatial relation
ShortEnum.description: with respect to the subject, the cause is ...
